dispositions.rationale: Adapter error-state semantics were standardized for runtime behavior, but remaining normalization is coupled to license adapter decomposition scope.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Unify adapter error contracts under one typed interface and remove residual mixed boolean/exception return behavior across Cloud+ adapters.

dispositions.rationale: Backend resolution paths are intentionally defensive and fail closed, with exhaustive branch tests guarding misconfiguration outcomes.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Converge backend resolution to a single deterministic runtime source with equivalent fail-closed guarantees and regression parity.

dispositions.rationale: Explicit close/rollback semantics are retained as deliberate safety controls across mixed transactional paths.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Formal proof and test pack demonstrate context-manager-only lifecycle with no rollback/close regression under all exception branches.

dispositions.rationale: ORM bootstrap import is retained intentionally to guarantee mapper registration at runtime startup.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Replace bootstrap import with explicit mapper registration hook and preserve startup determinism in CI bootstrap tests.

dispositions.rationale: Middleware ordering is correct for FastAPI reverse wrapping and currently validated by integration behavior.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Introduce startup assertions for middleware chain order and attach explicit documentation checks to API integration tests.

dispositions.rationale: Bearer-token CSRF bypass remains an explicit API contract with auth-coverage enforcement in release gates.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Add endpoint-classification policy tests proving browser-session routes cannot be served under bearer-auth bypass semantics.

dispositions.rationale: Swagger static assets are served from packaged read-only paths and have no app runtime write path.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Add immutable static asset integrity check in CI plus startup assertion for read-only static mount source.

dispositions.rationale: Vendor-module extraction is complete for correctness paths; remaining scope is class-size and orchestration decomposition.
dispositions.exit_criteria: Complete orchestration split so license adapter core is reduced to interface orchestration while vendor/runtime operations live in dedicated modules.
